projects.name: 99nightsguide.com
projects.description: Live game guide website for 99 Nights in the Forest (Roblox). Monetization: Patreon only (kid-friendly, no AdSense/Affiliates). Site fully deployed and functional.
projects.revenueModel: Patreon membership (https://patreon.com/PrintedPixels) + future Mailchimp newsletter sponsorships
nextSteps: Set up Mailchimp newsletter signup form on site
Create initial Patreon tiers and content
Add more game content (new updates, strategies)
Monitor traffic via Vercel Analytics
SEO monitoring — check Google Search Console indexing

milestones.event: Site built and deployed to Vercel
Patreon button fixed, AdSense removed (kid compliance), Amazon disclaimer removed

projects.name: Be A Fish In A Tank (Roblox)
projects.description: Multiplayer fish tank game with collection system. Phase 2 Expansion complete: 5 fish types × 8 variants each, auto-combining, bonus system (speed/shield/respawn/hidden), chest rewards, 6-category leaderboards. Multiplier progression (stats scale by variant). Ready for Phase 2E (DataStore + balance testing).
projects.revenueModel: Robux game passes + cosmetic skins (no pay-to-win)
nextSteps: Phase 2E: DataStore persistence (save collection, credits, stats across sessions)
Balance testing: verify XP curves, spawn rates, combo timing
Studio testing: full integration test (lobby → selection → swim → collection → lobby)
Optimize UI performance (6 leaderboards + inventory could lag)
Invite 10-15 beta testers for playtesting
Polish bonus notifications and visual feedback
Final balance pass and feature freeze
projects.phase: Phase 2D - Integration Complete (Ready for Phase 2E DataStore)

milestones.event: Balance audit complete, decision document created
Design decisions made (A/A/A): GoldenShark removed, no hunger, soft progression
Phase 2A-2D Complete: Collection system (5 fish × 8 variants), Bonus system (4 core types), Economy (XP→Credits), Full integration. 41 files committed.

documents: Game_Idea.md — Full design document with progression loop
rokit.toml — Rojo config for live Studio syncing

projects.name: PrintedPixels.shop — 3D Print E-Commerce

blockers: Custom domain DNS setup at IONOS (Jason's side)

Design first 3 tabletop miniatures
Set up e-commerce platform on PrintedPixels.shop

Test prints on Bambu printer
Launch marketplace listings (Makerworld + Etsy)

milestones.event: X/Twitter account created, CAD research started
